page.title: 02MATHERN,NEAR CHEPSTOW,IS...
page.content:
...a village of bliss lying in flowers and long grass as the sun dawns over the Severn...old houses with the wind blowing gently down the lonely road ... water dripping in Tewdric's well.. wheels standing still and birds singing sadly as the mill grows older
...a stranger, all on its own, watching the people go past...
...schoolchildren shouting, riding bikes, bustling past parents...being at the club on a Summer's evening breathing cool, fresh air and watching the cricket...retired people settling down to buy a quiet cottage and enjoy their old age..
...standing at the War Memorial watching the poppies blowing in the wind.
